thread.title: Watch Kriss Kyle slay BMX at Unit 23 Skatepark
thread.title_full: Watch Kriss Kyle slay BMX at Unit 23 Skatepark

title: Watch Kriss Kyle slay BMX at Unit 23 Skatepark
text:
Watch Kriss Kyle slay BMX at Unit 23 Skatepark Kriss Kyle rides his local skatepark in 100 seconds of pure action. By Faye Brozek on 8 February 2017 
With the Scottish winter in full swing, king of style and steeze Kriss Kyle took to his local skatepark for a session to slay away the winter blues. 
Being one of the most exciting riders in the world, Kyle never disappoints when it comes to pushing the boundaries of BMX and inventing new and unique ways to tackle obstaclesâ€“ just watch the way he rides this park and you'll see! 
Taking the Raw 100 series inside for this edition, listen to the pure action above as Kriss explores Unit 23 , the largest indoor skatepark in the UK.
